nodes.text: The Epsilon-class shuttle was a transport class used by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.
The Epsilon-class shuttle was created for the Star Wars D6 roleplaying adventure "Starfighters Down" by William W. Connors, published in the magazine Challenge 38 in 1989.

In the adventure, the class was only mentioned in the adventure's overview as being present on Phaylenn. Subsequently, all references to stealing a hyperdrive from a shuttle mention the Lambda-class shuttle, so this article assumes the target is of the latter class.
